tool.name: ExtractSettlements

param.name: fc_primary_settlements
param.dialogReference:
Primary Settlements Layer - this contains a feature for each settlement.

The layer will be checked for the required attributes.

param.name: fc_alternative_settlements
param.dialogReference: Alternative Names table - this contains alternative names/spellings for each settlement that is transposed to the output layer.

param.name: fc_output
param.dialogReference:
Output geodatabase where the flat settlements layer will be created. This geodatabase must exist already, you can use the new file geodatabase button in this dialog to create one.

Warning - if the geodatabase already contains an output settlements layer it may be overwritten.

param.name: output_schema_doc
param.dialogReference:
XML Workspace Document describing the schema for the output layer. This will be used to create the output layer.

By default the document is located in the folder above this toolbox called DENORMALISED_SCHEMA.xml

tool.summary: Produces a single output layer from input primary and alternative settlements feature classes.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Produces a single output layer from input primary and alternative settlements feature classes.
